name: Young Gray Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales steam in a 30 cone. Creatures in the area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 52 (15d6) fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful saving throw. Being underwater doesn’t grant resistance to this damage.
